definition: to reach a point in time, or a certain state or level
details:
verb
- to reach a point in time, or a certain state or level
= example: to reach a point in time, or a certain state or level
= synonyms: reach
- to reach a destination, either real or abstract
= example: to reach a destination, either real or abstract
= synonyms: hit
- to gain with effort
= example: to gain with effort
= synonyms: reach
